formulas.name: frmCleanToNumber
formulas.expression: IF( ISBLANK({!ToNumber}), "", SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE( SUBSTITUTE({!ToNumber}, "+",""), " ",""), "-",""), "(",""), ")","") )

formulas.name: frmFormattedToNumber
formulas.expression:
CASE( {!MarketUnit},
"DFJ DK", IF(BEGINS({!frmStripToNumber},"45"), {!frmStripToNumber}, "45"&{!frmStripToNumber}),
"FA_SE", IF( BEGINS({!frmStripToNumber},"46"), "46"&IF(MID({!frmStripToNumber},3,1)="0", RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-3), RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-2)), "46"&IF(LEFT({!frmStripToNumber},1)="0", RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-1), {!frmStripToNumber}) ),
"Ireland", IF( BEGINS({!frmStripToNumber},"353"), "353"&IF(MID({!frmStripToNumber},4,1)="0", RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-4), RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-3)), "353"&IF(LEFT({!frmStripToNumber},1)="0", RIGHT({!frmStripToNumber}, LEN({!frmStripToNumber})-1), {!frmStripToNumber}) ),
{!frmStripToNumber} )

formulas.name: frmStripToNumber

textTemplates.name: ptMissingValues
textTemplates.text: Missing Input Values for SMS Creation flow (AL - Create Outbound SMS) {!MissingValues}
